document.title: Hot Topic: Changes to the Tennessee Municipal Purchasing Law of 1983 (2007)
document.abstract: This session the state legislature enacted Public Chapter No. 84, removing the universal application language of the 2006 bill and returning the applicability of the Municipal Purchasing Law to its original scope.

field.name: comments
field.value:
#147
